name: 2022 3D Escape Game Engine Test
description:
UPDATED 6 JAN 2022

VERY early test of a new 3D escape game engine I'm building for my future projects in 2022

VERY simple so far, just look left and right using LEFT MOUSE BUTTON and LEFT CLICK to interact.

There is just two camera moves so far but all the basics are there behind the scenes for me to build the game, just need to see how this runs on a variety of computers!!

There's an FPS (Frames Per Second) counter in the bottom right, it should read about 60 if all is well, if not let me know ;-)
